Mikado
======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Mikado installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Mikado, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Mikado/2.3.4-foss-2022b
```
